job_tasks.phrase: Leverage cutting-edge AI tools to improve efficiency in coding, error detection, feature development, bug fixing etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes using AI tools within the software development lifecycle for tasks like coding, error detection, feature development, and bug fixing.

job_tasks.phrase: Modernize our strategic product lines through AI-driven innovations, enhancing performance, scalability, and user engagement.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates building and improving software products using AI to enhance their performance and engagement, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies, focusing on creating robust, cloud-native applications.
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct description of backend software development and deployment using specific technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: Enhance product functionality and effectively integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves modifying and adding features to existing products and integrating AI, which are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: deploy efficient back-end solutions using serverless technologies
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'deploy' and 'serverless technologies' points towards the operational aspects of putting software into production.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI-driven solutions into our cloud services.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI solutions into cloud services implies deployment and operational management within a cloud environment.

soft_skills.phrase: error detection, feature development, bug fixing

classification.rationale: The job description mentions leveraging AI tools and integrating AI-driven solutions, but it does not specify any generative AI techniques (LLMs, diffusion models, RAG, etc.) or frameworks typically associated with a GenAI Engineer. The focus is heavily on general software development and modernization using AI as a tool for efficiency.
